hero.name: Divya Sri Rajamahendravarapu
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Divya
hero.description: Crafting seamless user experiences and robust backend systems. Turning complex ideas into functional, beautiful, and scalable solutions.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE FOR FULL-STACK DEVELOPMENT PROJECTS
about.description: I am a motivated and detail-oriented Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies. I am passionate about transforming ideas into functional and scalable web applications. As a fresher, I bring a fresh perspective, enthusiasm, and a commitment to learning and delivering impactful solutions.

details.title: GPS Tracking Website for College Transportation
details.description: This project is a GPS tracking system designed to optimize college transportation. It includes features such as live bus tracking, FindMyBus functionality, PinMyBus for bus locations, a complaint system, and detailed bus information.

details.title: Official Website for Veda College Event Management
details.description: This project is the official website for Veda College, designed to manage over 20+ activities during the college event. It integrates real-time registration, event tracking, and participant management. The platform supports streamlined event organization for 1,000+ participants.

details.title: Grid Movement Game
details.description: This game features a grid where players control a character (a child wearing a helmet) to navigate through obstacles (dogs) and reach the target (a house). Players can move the character using directional buttons (TOP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT). The game is styled with vibrant gradients and glowing button effects for an immersive experience.

details.title: Explore France with Travel Tale
details.description: Travel Tale is a tourism website that allows users to explore France based on various categories and seasons. Whether you're looking for historical landmarks, scenic landscapes, cultural experiences, or seasonal festivities, Travel Tale provides a well-structured guide to make your journey unforgettable.

sectionHeading.title: Let’s Build Something Great Together
sectionHeading.subTitle: Always open to exciting collaborations and opportunities. Feel free to reach out and let’s turn ideas into impactful projects.
